name: docusaurus-plugin-smartlinker-workspace
description: Monorepo workspace for docusaurus-plugin-smartlinker and related packages.

scripts.site:prepare: npm run build && npm install --prefix examples/site --no-save
scripts.site:dev: npm run site:prepare && npm --prefix examples/site run dev
scripts.site:build: npm run site:prepare && npm --prefix examples/site run build
scripts.site:serve: npm run site:prepare && npm --prefix examples/site run serve
scripts.reset: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules examples/site/node_modules && npm install && npm run build && npm run site:build

author: Uli Z
